changeSet.sql: Insert into servlet.product(id, marking, type, is_on_discount, description, price) values (1, 'Flour, water and salt', 'BAKE', true, 'Bread', 10.5), (2, 'Flour, water, raisin, sugar and salt', 'BAKE', false, 'Bun', 5.5), (3, 'Water, fat, proteins, lactose (milk sugar)', 'MILK', false, 'Milk', 34.22), (4, 'Protein, some fat, carbohydrates, water, bifidobacteria', 'MILK', false, 'Yogurt', 56.26), (5, 'Starch', 'FRUIT', true, 'Apple', 15.23), (6, 'Frutoza', 'FRUIT', false, 'Orange', 100.97), (7, 'Starch', 'FRUIT', true, 'Pineapple', 19.32), (8, 'Frutoza', 'FRUIT', false, 'Pear', 1.09), (9, 'Frutoza', 'FRUIT', false, 'Grape', 13.40), (10, 'Starch', 'VEGETABLE', true, 'Potato', 0.94), (11, 'Starch', 'VEGETABLE', false, 'Carrot', 12.76), (12, 'Frutoza', 'VEGETABLE', true, 'Beet', 34.76), (13, 'Starch', 'VEGETABLE', true, 'Turnip', 10.32), (14, 'Starch', 'VEGETABLE', false, 'Swede', 94.63), (15, 'Frutoza', 'VEGETABLE', true, 'Cabbage', 81.54), (16, 'Starch', 'VEGETABLE', true, 'Radish', 90.45), (17, 'Husk', 'NUTS', true, 'Pistachios', 287.92), (18, 'Husk', 'NUTS', false, 'Cashew', 287.92), (19, 'Husk', 'NUTS', false, 'Hazelnut', 90.23), (20, 'Husk', 'NUTS', true, 'Cobnut', 48.92), (21, 'Husk', 'NUTS', false, 'Filbert', 93.87), (22, 'Husk', 'NUTS', true, 'Almond', 38.24);
